name: Basic Python For Researchers
tagline: This repository contains Ipython Notebook tutorial on Python programming language that I presented to my colleague in the workplace.
body:
---
This tutorial is written as an introductory course to [_Python_](https://www.python.org/) programming language for my colleagues at [Malaysian Nuclear Agency](http://www.nuclearmalaysia.gov.my). It uses [_IPython Notebook_](http://ipython.org/notebook.html) as a teaching tools. It briefly covers almost all the necessary topics that will be helpful to them. The _IPython Notebook_ is an interactive computational system that run on a browser. It enables the users to document not only _Python_ but also other codes ([_Perl_](https://www.perl.org/), [_R_](http://www.r-project.org/), [_Julia_](http://julialang.org/), [_Haskell_](http://www.haskell.org/haskellwiki/Haskell) _etc._), written account, [_LaTeX_](http://www.latex-project.org/) equations, _HTML_, images and videos and can also be easily transformed into a slide show presentation by utilizing [_reveal.js_](http://lab.hakim.se/reveal-js/#/). The user document will contain full record of all the computations and results and can easily be shared on email, [GitHub](http://github.com) or [nbviewer.ipython.org](http://nbviewer.ipython.org). This increase research productivity and allows fast distribution and collaboration of the research works undertaken at the agency to other researchers nationally and worldwide. This tutorial is part of the effort to introduce _Python_ especially using the _IPython Notebook_ as narrated in an [article](https://github.com/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/BNM2014.pdf) (in [Malay](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malay_language)).  

#### THE TUTORIALS  

The tutorials are works in progress. Only the completed tutorials are listed here:  

* [Tutorial 1 - Mathematical Operation](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/Tutorial%201%20-%20Mathematical%20Operation.ipynb)
* [Tutorial 2 - Strings and Formatting](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/Tutorial%202%20-%20Strings%20and%20Formatting.ipynb)
* [Tutorial 3 - Conditional Expression](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/Tutorial%203%20-%20Conditional%20Expression.ipynb)
* [Tutorial 4 - The Sequence](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/Tutorial%204%20-%20The%20Sequence.ipynb)
* [Tutorial 5 - Functions and Modules](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/Tutorial%205%20-%20Functions%20and%20Modules.ipynb)
* [Tutorial 6 - Numerical Python](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/Tutorial%206%20-%20Numerical%20Python.ipynb)

Other tutorials will be coming soon and will cover topics on [_Matplotlib_](http://matplotlib.org/), [_Scipy_](http://www.scipy.org/), and [_Pandas_](http://pandas.pydata.org/). You can also browse the main page at [nbviewer](http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/megatharun/basic-python-for-researcher/blob/master/Tutorial%20on%20Basic%20Python%20for%20Reseachers.ipynb).
